overview: Judy Koh, MBA, CPA, is an Operating Partner and the Chief Financial Officer at Bay City Capital and has been with the firm since April 1998. Ms. Koh manages the financial and treasury operations, as well as the accounting and tax reporting for all Bay City Capital entities. Ms. Koh served as Chief Financial Officer of Montgomery Capital from 1992-1998 where she was in charge of a portfolio of real estate partnerships. Previously, she was Accounting Manager at Juilliard Alpha Distributions and a Senior Accountant at BDO Seidman where she supervised a diverse range of audit engagements. Ms. Koh received an MBA in Finance and Accounting from Golden Gate University and a BS from the University of Massachusetts.
